text: Alastair R Davidson is a male former rower who competed for England. ==Rowing career== He represented England and won a silver medal in the eights and a bronze medal in the coxed fours at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Vancouver, Canada. He was a member of the Thames Rowing Club. ==Personal life== His grandson Freddie Davidson was on the winning Cambridge crew in the 2018 boat race. ==References== Category:English male rowers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in rowing Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England Category:Rowers at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: Alastair Davidson
